fields.name: Misdirect:
fields.value: Target a player. If they are using an ability that would cause an attack tonight, you will randomly redirect that ability. This ability will never redirect an attack to a player you are directly aligned with.

fields.name: Seed of Doubt (x3, Cost 75%/50%):
fields.value: Target a player. If they have an Investigative ability, it will return random feedback the next time it is used. This feedback will never directly implicate a player you are directly aligned with (for example, a Mage will never be seen visiting a player who dies). If the target does not have an Investigative ability, the ammo and charge cost of this ability are both refunded.

fields.name: Constrict (Cost 40%x?/20%x?):
fields.value: Target up to three players during the Evening. The next Night, they will only be able to target players who placed below them on the leaderboard. This ability costs 40%/20% for each player you target.

fields.name: Illusory (Passive):
fields.value: At the beginning of the game, you may choose a disguise role, which you will appear as to both role and alignment investigations.
